GTYPES.item: * This type is defined as SZADR_PRINTFORM_TABLE_LINE

item.TDLINE: We would be very obliged if you could settle this account immediately.
We would be very obliged if you could settle this account immediately.
wir wären Ihnen sehr verbunden, wenn Sie die folgende Rechnung bald
begleichen würden. Für das entgegengebrachte Vertrauen bedanken wir uns.
We would be very obliged if you could settle this account immediately.
